quest.name: Tanks for the Memory
journal: Ronitt looks primed to fire a particularly cheery dwarven greeting in your general direction.

Following the roaring success of the Rolling Tankards, Ronitt is planning to host a small gathering of those who have contributed to Watts's Anvil. Rather than asking you to visit the far reaches of Norvrandt, extending personal invitations to each guest one by one, he saves you the trouble by volunteering to do the legwork himself, and asks only that you wait for him in Clearmelt with Lorathia.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.

The guests arrive and are plied with Norvrandt's finest cuisine, while those partial to ale drink far more than is sensible. Regitt and Karutt offer some slurred words of gratitude and say their farewells before they can sully the clear waters of Clearmelt with the contents of their stomachs.

Eueliss and Sai-Lewq express their thanks to you and Ronitt for helping to restore Wright to some semblance of its former glory. Due to your efforts, their fields are capable of producing the barley used in their traditional ale. Now their first batch in years has been successfully brewed, allowing them to share the fruits of their labors, which certain guests have been imbibing rather liberally.

Ozogg reveals that you have inspired her to lead her own life, free from the rules and traditions of the Gogg. In a quite literally bare-faced display of defiance, she removes her helmet, and in so doing makes herself an outcast from her village. Though she pledges her allegiance to Watts's Anvil, she is more determined than ever to outdo Ronitt and claim the heirloom of their shared ancestor.

Upon returning to Watts's Anvil, Ronitt makes no attempt to conceal his distaste at what he considers the utmost indecency on the part of Ozogg, an act viewed with scorn by Tholl and Gogg alike. Nevertheless, it seems their destinies are intrinsically entwined as their mutual rivalry spurs them to push the boundaries of dwarven engineering. The citizens of Norvrandt, meanwhile, stand to benefit a great deal as a result of this friendly competition.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Just who I was hopin' to see!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Lali-ho to you, Forename!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Lali-ho!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Hi-ho!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Rh-Rhallie-who...?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Haha! A fine lali-ho if ever I heard one!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Hmm... Nah, I don't think that'll catch on, mate. I'd stick to a good old-fashioned “lali-ho” if I were you. But I'm glad you're here, all the same!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Ha! Don't tell me your head's gettin' soft in your old age! Or maybe you're just pullin' my leg? Either way, it's great to see you!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Since the last time we spoke, we've been busier than ever. Our first payin' customers, Iriolva and Cobleva, have already started usin' Rollin' Tankards to ferry their goods about.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: So far, there've been no reports of any horrendous accidents or anythin', which is a relief.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: We'll be aimin' for the same high level of quality for the rest of the tanks, and thanks to our new friends, word's been gettin' around fast.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Orders have been flyin' in thick and fast! This is goin' better'n I dared dream!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: This calls for a celebration!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: 'Course, it wouldn't be the same without all of the others, so I'll go an' round 'em up. In the meantime, why don't you go over to Clearmelt and wait with Lorathia?

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: Oh, I see you're the opposite of what they call “fashionably late.” Since you're here, you can help me get everything ready.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Heh, I'm surprised you resisted the temptation to start diggin' in before we got here!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: I bet you ain't never seen a feast like this! We've got the best grub Norvrandt has to offer. Eueliss and Sai-Lewq even brought a keg of their famous ale over from Wright!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: "But how did they carry somethin' so heavy all this way?“ I hear you cry.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Yeah, that's right...

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: ...by tank, of course!

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: Those things might be armed to the teeth with some of the world's most advanced weaponry, but it's what they carry that makes the real difference. People across the land can get what they need, when they need it.

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: Not to mention a few of life's luxuries, too!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: It seems all of our hard work has finally paid off!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: To think that Wright is at long last able to produce its own ale again! Thanks to you and Ronitt, we've had the best barley crops in years.

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Even our very first batch has earned the approval of our village's most demanding beer aficionados. And due to the much improved quality of the soil, we have begun growing our own fruit, the juice of which we've brought for the younger ones and teetotalers to enjoy.

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: All right everyone, it's time for a toast! So raise a tankard of ale, or tankard of juice if you're a mewling whelp like Ronitt─

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Watch it, Ozogg, or you'll be wearin' that drink of yours!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Ahem! To the continued success of Watts's Anvil and all of our friends!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: (-Everyone-)Cheers!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: The years of struggle and adversity seem a distant memory to the inhabitants of the First as they strive for a better tomorrow.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: In particular, the dwarves of Kholusia will have a vital role to play in the days to come, with their ingenuity and diligence paving the way to unlimited possibilities.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: And even after the dishes were cleared away, the celebrations continued...

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Shay there, misshmishter... You don't sheem drunk in the <hic> shlightesht.

dialogue.name: KARUTT
dialogue.text: <hic> I...w-would jusht l-like to shay... To shay...

dialogue.name: KARUTT
dialogue.text: <snore>

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Oi, Karutt! At leasht <hic> finish your shentence afore you fall ashleep!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: I think...what he meansh ish...we all owe you our heartfelt thanksh, eshpecially Ronitt.

dialogue.name: KARUTT
dialogue.text: Afore you showed up, he wouldn't shay boo to a gooshe, but now, <hic> he's turned into a great leader! Musht be from following your <hic> example.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: We know you've got other people out there who <hic> need you, sho it would be shelfish to expect you to shtay, but we're grateful for the time you've <hic> shpent with ush.

dialogue.name: KARUTT
dialogue.text: It m-means <hic> a lot, it really does.

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: And if you're ever passhing through, be sure to pay ush a visit!

dialogue.name: KARUTT
dialogue.text: <hic> Anyway, w-we'd besht be heading b-back to the Anvil. <hic> Shafe travels!

dialogue.name: REGITT
dialogue.text: Oh, and make sure you shay <hic> good-bye to Euelissh and Shai-Lewq afore you leave. They've been meaning to shpeak with you!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Oh, there you are!

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Eueliss and I were just talking about you. We were wondering if the ale was to your liking, and then it occurred to me that you may not even drink in the first place.

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Do you, ah, partake in the odd tipple?

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: No, I never touch the stuff.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: I've been known to wet my whistle on occasion.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: You can't buy love, but you can buy alcohol, which is better.

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Then perhaps we have found another customer for our soon-to-be-famous fruit juice! And be sure to tell your friends!

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Yes, and no doubt the volume varying in accordance with the nature of said occasion! A happy one such as this calls for more than a mere sip or two, I daresay!

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Words to live by! Perhaps we can use that as our slogan?

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Can I say, Sai-Lewq, how wonderful it is to see you in such high spirits! You're like a changed man!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: A change we have you to thank for, Forename. Considering all you've done for us and our village, I cannot imagine how we will ever repay you, so if there is aught you need, just say the word!

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: My sentiments exactly. I dread to think what would have become of us without your intervention.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Yes, and we owe a debt of gratitude to Master Ronitt, as well. Thanks to him and his automaton, my father's dream has at long last come true!

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: If we take a leaf out of Ronitt's book by combining ingenuity with hard work, there is nothing we cannot achieve.

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: Maybe the next time you come to Wright, we'll have something new to show you. Our doors are always open, so don't be a stranger!

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: Ah! I almost forgot to ask, but have you spoken with Ozogg? It seems there is something she would like to discuss with you.

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: I must say, this is quite the gathering!

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: This ale from Wright really hits the spot!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Who does she think she is, callin' me a “mewlin' whelp”!? I don't even know what that means, but I assume it's an insult!

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: Have you eaten your fill, Forename?

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: I'm sure shehe has room for some more. Have you tried these wrigglers from Amh Araeng? If you can pluck up the courage, they're quite delicious!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Yeah! I can't get enough of 'em!

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: Urp... Just thinking about them is making me queasy.

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: Come on, live a little! It's like I always say: youth is wasted on the young.

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: Yes, and it'll be even more of a waste if a gifted engineer like me chokes to death on some godsforsaken worm! I've got to look after myself if I want these plans of ours to come to fruition.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Anyway, Lorathia, I'll bet your best years are still ahead of you. In fact, why don't you come and help out at Watts's Anvil? It's gotta be better'n drinkin' tea and soakin' in the hot springs all day!

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: When you get to my age, you'll learn to appreciate things like that, you mark my words! Still, it wouldn't do to let my skills get rusty. I suppose I could pop over and do a spot of welding from time to time.

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: Actually, Forename, there's something I want to say to you.

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: For most of my life, I've been living according to others' expectations, without thinking about what I want. But thanks to you, I've made up my mind!

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: Like you, I'm going to pursue my own goals, my own dreams. That's why I've decided to carry on here, where I can express myself and be who I want to be.

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: Rather than wasting my life being bound by traditions and rules, I want to be free to go where I please and do as I please.

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: But don't you want to go back to your village? All the Tholls here have permission to travel between Tomra and the Anvil whenever they want. What about you?

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: Well, it's not as though I've been banished. Not yet, anyway.

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: I can hardly go back to Komra now, can I?

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: From this day forth, I am no longer a Gogg! I shall live only as Ozogg, descendant of Watts himself. I answer to no one!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: B-But...you...

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: You can't just take off your helmet like that! I-It's...indecent!

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: Hahaha! I think he's just getting flustered by the sight of a pretty girl!

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: Ahahaha! How can he expect to beat me in a battle of wits if he turns into a babbling buffoon every time I take my helmet off? Watts's hammer is as good as mine!

dialogue.name: OZOGG
dialogue.text: That reminds me, I should get started on my next creation and prove my superiority once and for all! Time to head back to the Anvil!

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: And it looks like I might be joining you sooner rather than later.

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: You young'uns have brought me some much-needed excitement, and I can't wait to see what you'll come up with next.

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: When I heard they were bringing worms over from Amh Araeng for us to eat, I thought they'd gone barmy. But having tasted them, I can see the appeal!

dialogue.name: EUELISS
dialogue.text: While we'll be taking it one step at a time, if we continue our efforts, Wright will go from strength to strength!

dialogue.name: SAILEWQ
dialogue.text: If only our dearly departed were here with us now... I should like to think they are watching over us even at this very moment.

dialogue.name: LORATHIA
dialogue.text: This certainly makes a difference from the usual crowd we have here at Clearmelt!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: That Ozogg! Ain't she got no shame!? Just because she don't wanna go back to Komra, there's no need to...to...expose herself like that!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: I know you ain't a Tholl or a Gogg, so I don't expect you to understand, but you agree with me, don't you?

dialogue.name: Q3
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: This is the worst thing that's ever happened in Lakeland. The worst thing!

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: You should take off your helmet, too. You might find it liberating.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Yeah, exactly! I should give her a piece of my mind!

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Wh-What!?

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: No, absolutely not, never! I'd rather lose my whole damn head than remove my helmet! Grrr... This is all Ozogg's fault! She needs a bloody good talkin' to.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: ...But that can wait.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Bugger it, I can't remember what I was gonna say now! Urngh...somethin' about thankin' you, or whatever it was...

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Well, I s'pose I should express my gratitude for stickin' with me through thick 'n thin, even when it looked like this whole plan was gonna blow up in my face.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: I know sometimes I can get a bit jealous of you havin' so many talents compared to me, bein' the savior of the bleedin' world and all that.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: But I know you ain't doin' it to steal my thunder, you're just tryin' to be a good friend. And you are. The very best.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: Bloody hells, keep this up an' I'll start bawlin' like a newborn! Anyway, the struggle to get those tanks might be over, but me, Ozogg, and the others'll carry on here.

dialogue.name: RONITT
dialogue.text: So if you ever feel like showin' off those skills of yours, you know where to come. In the meantime, best of luck with savin' the world or whatever you'll be doin'!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have achieved Bloodsworn reputation with Watts's Anvil.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You will receive an experience point bonus upon completion of the dwarf tribal daily quests.
